description:
Serving a diverse range of clients throughout Berks County and beyond from our office in Wyomissing, Pennsylvania, our dedicated attorneys at Kitay Law Offices provide unmatched counsel and support to those who have legal needs involving any of the following areas:

  • Personal injury, motor vehicle accidents and other preventable tragedies
  • Workers' compensation
  • Immigration law
  • DUI defense
  • Criminal defense

In practice for more than 25 years now, we have grown to become one of Pennsylvania's most prominent and successful full-service law firms, with six total law offices across the state. This expansion lends credence to the level of success we have achieved. During our time in practice, we have recovered millions of dollars for our plaintiff clients while assisting many others in obtaining the favorable outcomes they seek for their complex and serious legal issues as efficiently and cost-effectively as possible.

Regarded as leaders in our field, our attorneys have appeared on various television and radio news programs as well as in multiple online forums, where they have offered in-depth legal commentary on a variety of legal subjects. In addition, some of our lawyers have been selected for inclusion in Pennsylvania Super Lawyers' Rising Stars, an annual distinction given to the top 2.5% of attorneys in the state who are either age 40 or younger or have been in practice for 10 years or less. Our law firm has also received many testimonials and referrals from our satisfied clients.

To find out more about how we can best assist you with your legal matter, you can contact Kitay Law Offices by phone or through our law firm's website to schedule a free initial consultation. We offer fluent Spanish-speaking services as well as virtual consultations to help keep you safe and healthy in today's uncertain environment.
